name: Frederick Flight Center, Inc.
about: Frederick Flight Center, Inc., located at the Frederick Municipal Airport in Maryland, is a premier flight school dedicated to safety, professionalism, and high-quality education. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including private pilot, instrument, commercial, multi-engine, and certified flight instructor certifications. Our training includes both ground school and flight instruction, utilizing single-engine and multi-engine aircraft as well as simulators. Our fleet is maintained to the highest industry standards by FAA-certified technicians in our own on-site maintenance facility. We provide a friendly and welcoming atmosphere, ensuring that our students receive expert training in a safe and supportive environment. Whether you are aspiring to become a professional pilot or simply want to fly for recreation, Frederick Flight Center is committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
